page.title: 02CHRISTCHURCH OLD AND NEW
page.content: Christchurch has changed enormously since it was a village community hundreds of years ago.Towards the quay and the town centre ,many old buildings still survive.This is my favourite part of the town.The{Priory is a beautiful building,Christchurch's main landmark.The{castle}and the {Constable's House,}though in ruin,add to the town's character.Some old and very pretty cottages stand by the Priory gates.There are few old houses left in Christchurch now.A newer part of the town is called Jumpers,where I live.The housing is about 35 years old.There are new housing developments at Fairmile.{Saxon Square}is new for shopping.It is well designed and attractive,but generally I prefer the older part of the town to the new.
